CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Golden Enthusiasts relative to Azure Legion?
SRP.A: Golden Enthusiasts is {below} Azure Legion in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Silverleaf Supporters relative to Golden Enthusiasts?
SRP.A: Silverleaf Supporters is {above} Golden Enthusiasts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Fanatics relative to Silverleaf Supporters?
SRP.A: Ironwood Fanatics is {below} Silverleaf Supporters in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fan engagement?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Golden Enthusiasts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fan engagement?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Fanatics}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Shadowfen Devotees's maximum Fan Engagement in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Shadowfen Devotees's maximum Fan Engagement is in {1993}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Legion's minimum Fan Engagement in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Legion's minimum Fan Engagement is in {1987}.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1993, did the total Fan Engagement experience a larger or smaller change than between 1978 and 1982?
NC.A: The change in total fan engagement between 1987 and 1993 was {larger} than between 1978 and 1982.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 1986, was the average total Fan Engagement higher or lower than between 1982 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total fan engagement between 1983 and 1986 was {higher} than between 1982 and 1983.

NC.Q: Was the total Fan Engagement in 1988 higher or lower than in 1992?
NC.A: The total fan engagement in 1988 was {lower} than in 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1979, was the average total Fan Engagement higher or lower than between 1986 and 1990?
NC.A: The average total fan engagement between 1978 and 1979 was {lower} than between 1986 and 1990.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Shadowfen Devotees} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironwood Fanatics and Golden Enthusiasts first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironwood Fanatics and Golden Enthusiasts first exchanged leading positions in {1979}.
